GUIDE

Best AI Website Builders for Agencies & Design Teams

Complete guide to AI website builders for agencies and design teams. Compare white-label options, code export, collaboration tools, and pricing.

Best for Agencies: Quick Picks

Complex Projects: Webflow (9.2/10)

Design Focus: Framer (9.0/10)

Full-Service: Wix Studio (8.5/10)

Fast Delivery: Durable (8.0/10)

Code Export: Webflow, Framer

White Label: All available

Team Collab: Webflow, Wix Studio

Client Handoff: All support

Top AI Builders for Agencies

Webflow

0.9199999999999999/10

Why for agencies: Powerful CMS, code export, Logic for complex sites, white-label available

Pricing: $23-212/mo (agency plans)

Best for: Complex client projects

Framer

0.9/10

Why for agencies: Beautiful designs, code export, fast delivery, impressive client results

Pricing: $15-35/mo (team plans)

Best for: Design-focused agencies

Wix

0.85/10

Why for agencies: Wix Studio for agencies, white-label, client management, huge app ecosystem

Pricing: $23-500/mo (agency plans)

Best for: Full-service agencies

Durable

0.8/10

Why for agencies: Fastest client delivery, built-in CRM, easy for simple business sites

Pricing: $15-25/mo

Best for: Quick turnaround projects

Essential Agency Features

!

White Labeling

Essential for agencies

Remove builder branding, use your own brand

Available in:

Webflow (Enterprise)Wix (Agency)Durable (Available)Framer (Team plans)
!!

Client Handoff

Critical

Transfer completed sites to clients for ongoing management

Available in:

Webflow (Workspace transfer)Wix (Client accounts)10Web (Export)Framer (Export)
?

Important

Export clean code for self-hosting or custom development

Available in:

Important

Agency Pricing Models

Per-Project Pricing

Charge client lump sum, keep builder subscription

Pros

  • ✓Keep recurring revenue
  • ✓Build asset value
  • ✓Client independence

Cons

  • ✗You pay subscription
  • ✗Client tied to your account
  • ✗Ongoing maintenance burden

Client Pays

Client pays for their own subscription

Pros

  • ✓No ongoing cost
  • ✓Client independence
  • ✓Simple model

Cons

  • ✗Lower recurring revenue
  • ✗Client can leave
  • ✗Less control

White-Label Resell

Resell builder services under your brand

Pros

  • ✓Maximum control
  • ✓Recurring revenue
  • ✓Brand consistency

Cons

  • ✗Requires enterprise plan
  • ✗More responsibility
  • ✗Support burden

Agency Pricing Guide

  • Simple business site: $500-1500 setup + $50-100/month maintenance
  • Portfolio/creative site: $1000-3000 setup + $100-200/month
  • E-commerce site: $2000-5000+ setup + $200-500/month
  • Custom/complex site: $5000-15000+ setup + $500-2000/month
  • AI advantage: 50-70% time reduction = higher margins or competitive pricing
  • Value pricing: Charge based on value delivered, not hours spent
  • Retainer model: Setup fee + monthly retainer for updates, hosting, and support

Agency Success Tips

  • Standardize your process: Create templates and workflows for repeatable delivery.
  • Use AI as starting point: Generate foundation, then customize for unique results.
  • Focus on strategy: AI handles building, you focus on client goals and messaging.
  • Build case studies: Showcase AI-powered results to demonstrate speed and quality.
  • Offer maintenance packages: Recurring revenue from updates and support.
  • Train clients on handoff: Ensure they can manage basic updates independently.
  • Leverage code export: For high-value clients, deliver custom code they own.

Agencies have excellent AI options. Webflow for complex projects, Framer for design, Durable for speed.
